text: geudeul-ui haeng-wineun neolbgo gip-eun badasog-ui amheuggwado gatnola padoga geu wileul deop-euni tto padoga geu wi leul deop-eumyeo guleum-i geu wie deohamae eodum-eun alaelo gyeobchyeo issdeola geuga son-eul naemil-eodo geugeos-eul bol su eobsna ni hananim-eulobuteo bich-eul badji mos hanja geuegeneun bich-i eobsnola
